notes.description: Any special notes associated with this authority

eTag.description:
ETag for the entity. The ETag is specific to each version of this entity and changes whenever the entity data changes. Clients can
send the eTags of cached entities to the server when requesting data and the server can return only entities for which the current ETag does
not match the requested tag - i.e. just those entities that have changed.

Authority.description: Defines the area controlled by a particular local authority. Authorities may contain zones and may also contain parking entities directly.

NotFoundResponse.description: A response indicating the requested resource was not found

entityETag.description:
The Etag of the current latest version of the Zone referred to by this result. This allows
clients to determine if they have the latest version of the zone in their local cache and only
request the entity if it is missing.

entityId.description: Entity ID of the zone referred to by this result

defaults.description: List of defaults for this zone

ZoneSearchResult.description: Represents a single result returned from a search for zones

property.description: The property that caused the problem

code.description: Machine-readable code representing the type of error

NoParkingReasonType.description: Reasons that parking is not permitted at a parking entity

notes.description: Any special note associated with this zone

eTag.description:
ETag for the entity. The ETag is specific to each version of this entity and changes whenever the entity data changes. Clients can
send the eTags of cached entities to the server when requesting data and the server can return only entities for which the current ETag does
not match the requested tag - i.e. just those entities that have changed.

Zone.description:
A zone is an area defined by the local authority that acts as a container for a set of OnStreet and Carpark entities.
A zone may define common parking rules that are applicable generally across parts of the kerb (e.g. Single Yellow Lines) and may
define rules parking entities that can be overridden by individual entities.

parkingEntities.description: Parking entities returned from the query

MapEntitiesResponse.description: Response shape for a request for multiple Map Entities

startTime.description: Start of the window for which to retrieve state. Required.

endTime.description: End of the window for which to retrieve state. Required.

SearchParkingByGeoJsonViewportQuery.description:
Request for searching for Parking Entities for a square viewport. The viewport is defined by the latitude and longitude of
the centre point and the length of one side.

Permit.description: A permit that can be held by a vehicle operator

ids.description: List of Ids of entities to fetch

MapEntitiesListQuery.description: Request allowing a client to fetch a list of entities

ParkingAllowed.description: Enum to indicate the different scenarios whereby parking may be allowed or denied.

noReturn.description: The 'no return' window, i.e. the time after parking during which the user is not allowed to return to the bay.

cost.description: The total cost of parking given the context of the quote.

rulesApplyUntil.description: The date and time until the rules on which this quote is based apply.

canExtendUntil.description:
The maximum time until which the user can park. This value ignores the requested window and is the
latest time the user is able to remain parked in the space if they were to extend their session
beyond the requested window.

permittedContexts.description: Vehicle operators for whom this quote is valid

pricedUntil.description:
The maximum time until which the user can park for the price specified in the 'cost' field. The
'cost' field is the cost for the requested time window, but that price may entitle the user to
park longer than requested, in which case this field holds the time that the cost will entitle
them to park.

relevance.description:
Server-calculated relevance for this quote. May be used by the client if required to easily choose
between multiple quotes for a parking entity to display a single price for a bay.

paymentMethodIds.description: Payment method(s) for which this quote is valid

currency.description: Currency of the value in the Cost field

isFreeParking.description: TRUE if parking is free, false if it is paid.

minCost.description:
Minimum cost for parking. This is the minimum amount the user will pay for parking,
regardless of when they leave the space.

onStreetParkingType.description:
The type of the on street parking for the purposes of this quote. On street parking entities may have multiple types that apply
at different times or simultaneously. If multiple types apply AND the vehicle operator context is such that more than one type allows
the user to park, then multiple quotes will be returned for a single result and each will have a different On Street Parking Type.
            
For example, a bay may be simultaneously a Standard Bay and a Disabled Bay (if, for example, parking is free for blue disabled badge holders but
paid for everyone else). If the vehicle operator has a blue badge permit, they will get two quotes back. One will have a type of StandardBay and
the other will have a type of DisabledBay.
            
This field will not have a value for car parks.

ParkingQuote.description: A contextualized quote for a parking session, including related data such as No Return and Minimum Cost

paymentProviders.description: Payment providers returned from the query

PaymentProvidersResponse.description: Response containing a list of payment providers

isFreeParking.description: Whether parking is free or paid

permittedContexts.description: The vehicle operators for whom this default applies

markingTypeId.description: Type of markings (bays, single yellow lines etc) to which these defaults apply

ZoneDefault.description: A default zone-wide setting that applies to all parking entities of the given bay type unless overridden specifically at the Parking Entity level

Address.description: A standard address for an Onstreet bay or Car park

locationCode.description: A unique code for each parking entity assigned by a payment provider and is their identifier for payment purposes

paymentMethodIds.description: Payment methods supported at this onstreet location.

totalCapacity.description: How many vehicles can be parked at the parking entity. May be approximate (in the case of unmarked bays)

eTag.description:
ETag for the entity. The ETag is specific to each version of this entity and changes whenever the entity data changes. Clients can
send the eTags of cached entities to the server when requesting data and the server can return only entities for which the current ETag does
not match the requested tag - i.e. just those entities that have changed.

authorityId.description: ID of the authority in which the parking entity resides

zoneId.description: ID of the zone in which the parking entity resides

ParkingEntity.description: Base class for Map Entities that support parking, either onstreet or car parks

excludeCostGreaterThan.description:
If supplied, bays for which the total cost over the requested duration exceeds the supplied value will not be included in the result.
            
If the ExcludePaidParking filter is set to TRUE, this property will have no effect.

excludePaidParking.description: TRUE to exclude paid parking bays from the result. Optional. Defaults to FALSE if omitted.

excludeFreeParking.description: TRUE to exclude free parking bays from the result. Optional. Defaults to FALSE if omitted.

excludeEntityTypes.description:
If supplied, entities that have the given Map Entity Types types will be excluded from the response. Passing Zone or Authority
entity types will result in a Bad Request response.

excludeTruncatedParking.description:
TRUE to exclude from the result any bays where parking is not allowed for part of the requested time window for the given vehicle operator. Optional. Defaults to FALSE if omitted.
            
Note that this filter does not imply the exclusion of bays where parking is not allowed for the entirety of the requested time window. To exclude such results, use the ExcludeNoParking filter.
if using ExcludeTruncatedParking.

excludeNoParking.description: TRUE to exclude from the result any bays where parking is not allowed for the entirety of the requested time window for the given vehicle operator. Optional. Defaults to FALSE if omitted.

SearchParkingByViewportFilters.description: Filters that a caller can apply to limit the results returned when searching for parking by viewport

paymentsTelephone.description: Phone number for taking payments (if pay-by-phone is supported)

cardPaymentsExternalUrl.description: URL for taking payments (if online payments are supported)

PaymentProvider.description: An organization that supports parking payments.

quotes.description:
List of quotes for parking at this parking entity. If the context of the search means that there are multiple prices returned,
one quote will be generated for each price and the quotes will be decorated with the payment methods, bay types and vehicle operator
context for which they are valid. If parking is not allowed, no quotes are returned.

entityETag.description:
The Etag of the current latest version of the Parking Entity referred to by this result. This allows
clients to determine if they have the latest version of the parking entity in their local cache and only
request the entity if it is missing.

ParkingEntitySearchResult.description: Represents a single result returned from a search for Parking Entities.

maxVehicleManufactureYear.description: The latest year of manufacture of the vehicle for which the surcharge applies

SurchargeCriteria.description: The criteria for which a surcharge may be applied

errors.description: Collection of validation errors caused by the request

BadRequestResponse.description: A response indicating the request was invalid

parking.description: List of Parking Entities returned by the response

ParkingSearchResponse.description: Response shape for parking search requests

zones.description: List of search results returned in this response

ZoneSearchResponse.description: Response shape for zone search requests

SurchargeValueType.description: Indicates how clients should interpret the value in a SurchargeDetails object - as a flat rate (absolute cost) or percentage of the original charge

permits.description: Any permits held by the operator (e.g. blue badge, car club permit)

activityTypeId.description: Activity the operator is seeking to perform at the kerbside (parking, loading)

VehicleOperatorContext.description:
A set of values that pertain to the driver looking to park (their vehicle, permits, intended activity)
that affect whether or not they can park and/or the price they pay if they do.

endTime.description: End of the window for which to retrieve state. Required.

startTime.description: Start of the window for which to retrieve state. Required.

viewportSize.description: Length of one side of the square viewport in meters. Required.

SearchParkingByCentreAndViewportSizeQuer.description:
Request for searching for Parking Entities for a square viewport. The viewport is defined by the latitude and longitude of
the centre point and the length of one side.

SurchargeDetails.description:
Details of a surcharge that may be applied to a parking charge, including the amount of the surcharge
and the criteria under which it is applied.

startTime.description: Start of the window for which to retrieve state. Required.

endTime.description: End of the window for which to retrieve state. Required.

markingTypeIds.description:
Marking types for which to return state. Optional. If omitted, defaults are returned for all the marking types
in the zone for which they are defined.

SearchZonesByViewportQuery.description: A request to search for zone default information by viewport

MapEntityType.description: Enumeration for the different types of Map Entity - objects returned by the API that can be drawn on a map.

Note.description: Models a note that can be attached to an entity

post.description: Retrieve a list of entities by their IDs

get.description: Retrieves a parking entity by its ID
Returns a specific zone by its ID

post.summary: Parking by centre and viewport size
post.description:
This query creates a square viewport with the centre at ViewportCentre and side length of ViewportSize.
It then returns all Parking Entities within that viewport.

get.description: Returns a specific authority by its ID
Returns payment providers for the given parking entity ID

post.description: Returns defaults for zones that are at least partially within the specified viewport. Also returns the ID of the zone and authority in which the centroid of the viewport resides.
This query creates a custom viewport from the supplied GeoJson polygon and returns all results within the bounds of that polygon.
